title: Jhon Epam
text:
Jhon Epam Nwankwo (born 2 May 1983) is an <a href="Equatorial%20Guinea">Equatoguinean</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> striker, who recently played for <a href="SR%20Villaverde%20Boetticher%20CF">Villaverde Boetticher</a> in the Spanish <a href="Categor%C3%ADa%20Preferente%20de%20Aficionados%20de%20la%20Comunidad%20de%20Madrid%23Group%202">Preferente de la Comunidad de Madrid Group 2</a>).
He is a former player of <a href="The%20Panters%20F.C.">The Panters F.C.</a> of the <a href="Equatoguinean%20Premier%20League">Equatoguinean Premier League</a>.
